column1: '''''Locus'' 149''' is an issue of the American science fiction and fantasy magazine ''[[Wikipedia:Locus (magazine)
column2: Locus]]''. Issue #149 includes: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] obituary; Tolkien tributes by [[Wikipedia:Lester del Rey
column3: Lester del Rey]], [[L. Sprague de Camp]], [[Wikipedia:Sterling E. Lanier

column1: L. Sprague de Camp briefly describes his [[Index:Reminiscences of J.R.R. Tolkien
column2: meeting]] with Tolkien, and Sterling Lanier mentions his correspondence with Tolkien (consisting of a "dozen or so" [[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"

column1: *[http://sacnoths.blogspot.se/2012/07/new-arrivals-2nd-of-2.html John D. Rateliff writes about the ''Locus'' Tolkien memorial issue]
